channel.title: Reverse-Engineering on zphyr.net

item.title: smileyCTF 2025: Fruit Ninja
item.description:
One of my favourite challenges from last week’s smileyCTF was Fruit Ninja, a RISC-V reversing challenge for a custom CPU. is a RISC-V reversing challenge that involves a custom CPU and

Challenge description

my friend made a custom cpu, so of course i had to make a game for it. can you win? @unvariant REMEMBER TO GIVE THEM CPU

  • fruitninja.tar.gz
  • Creator: flocto
  • rev

Summary

  1. Discover that CPU is a Harvard architecture RISC-V 32 machine.
  2. Recompile ROM and RAM into ELF using custom linker script.
  3. Decompile ELF and find Base64-style flag checker.
  4. Brute force individual flag chars ().
